# Temporarily excluded tests for CI reliability.
# Format:
# Fully.Qualified.Test.Name|owner=<team-or-user>|expires=YYYY-MM-DD|reason=<short note>
# Example:
# AIUsageTracker.Tests.Infrastructure.SomeTests.FlakyCase_ShouldBeQuarantined|owner=@dev-infra|expires=2026-03-31|reason=Intermittent timeout on windows-latest
